translation.en: [group] ♪ …birthday, dear Franny ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
-[man] Happy birthday. -[woman] Good job, girls.
translation.zh:
‎-生日快乐 弗兰妮
‎-厉害啊 姑娘们

translation.en: Oh, I love you, baby, so much!
translation.zh: ‎我爱你 宝贝 非常爱你！

translation.en: [girl] Come on!
I'm gonna get you guys some cake.
-Uh, I'll get some wine. [kisses] -Okay.
-Let me do that. -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎让我来吧 这样你可以去吃点东西

translation.en: -That way, you can actually eat. -Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎让我来吧 这样你可以去吃点东西 ‎谢谢

translation.en: You've been looking so thin, you're making us moms look terrible.
translation.zh:
‎你最近看起来非常瘦
‎相比较我们其他妈妈的身材很糟糕

translation.en: -Good, right? -Yeah.
What's the matter, Mom?
It's hot. Your father can't keep his eyes open.
translation.zh: ‎这里好热 你爸爸都睁不开眼睛了

translation.en: -Oh, I'm fine. -It is a four-hour drive from Worcester.
translation.zh:
‎-我没事
‎-从伍斯特到这里 开车要四个小时

translation.en: I know. I'm going to make you guys some coffee.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我去给你们弄点咖啡 好吗？

translation.en: Can you make a pot of coffee? And we need another bottle of white wine.
translation.zh:
‎你能煮一壶咖啡吗？
‎我们还需要一瓶白葡萄酒

translation.en: White wine, right. On it. Mom, can you do the coffee?
translation.zh:
‎-白葡萄酒 好 妈妈 你能煮咖啡吗？
‎-好

translation.en: [woman] I'll be right back.
Everyone, if you all raise your cups. To Dr. George, huh?
translation.zh:
‎各位 请大家举起手中的杯子
‎敬乔治博士

translation.en: [all] Hear, hear!
-It is official, right? -Yeah, it is officially official.
translation.zh:
‎-正式定了吧？
‎-对 正式定了

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm no longer a PhD widow. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: ‎对 我不再是如同丧偶的博士妻子了

translation.en: And I have some more good news.
Uh, my dissertation actually landed me a gig upstate.
translation.zh:
‎我还有别的好消息 ‎我的毕业论文
‎让我在纽约上州找到一份工作

translation.en: -[woman 2] Wow, fast. -[man 2] It must be really good.
translation.zh:
‎-真够快的
‎-你的论文一定写得不错

translation.en: I haven't read it yet.
-George is very secretive. -No, I am chickenshit.
translation.zh:
‎-乔治做事总是遮遮掩掩
‎-不是 我只是很胆小而已

translation.en: Catherine was top of the class at art school.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟琳以前可是艺术学校的尖子生

translation.en: -Oh, is the position at Bard? -No, it's at Saginaw.
translation.zh:
‎-是巴德学院的职位吗？
‎-不是 是塞基诺

translation.en: It's a small private college upstate.
You're a big city girl now with your dream job.
translation.zh:
‎你现在是大城市的姑娘
‎做着自己梦想中的工作

translation.en: You thought this through?
George really wants this. He hates the struggle here.
translation.zh:
‎乔治真的很想去
‎他讨厌在这里苦苦挣扎

translation.en: It's gotten worse since his father cut him off.
translation.zh:
‎自从他爸爸不给他提供经济支持后
‎情况就更糟了

translation.en: And I had no idea he was even taking money from them.
translation.zh: ‎我之前根本不知道他在拿父母的钱

translation.en: Apparently, it's been happening since Franny was born.
translation.zh: ‎实际上从弗兰妮出生起就开始了

translation.en: Moving's expensive, too.
I know, but you can get a lot for a little up there.
translation.zh: ‎但是那边用一点钱就能买很多东西

translation.en: -It's supposedly really pretty. -Yeah, I've driven through there.
translation.zh:
‎-而且应该非常漂亮
‎-是啊 我曾开车路过

translation.en: Rich horsey weekenders and lots of full-time rednecks.
translation.zh:
‎当地全职工作的都是乡巴佬
‎有钱人只是周末去骑骑马

translation.en: I know, but George has made some big sacrifices for me,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但乔治为我做了很大的牺牲

translation.en: and I-- I owe it to him to at least try.
translation.zh: ‎这是我欠他的 我至少应该尝试一下

translation.en: [Catherine] Hey.
[George] Hey.
I think I've found the perfect house for us.
translation.zh: ‎我想我找到了最合适的房子

translation.en: -[door opens] -[woman] Oh, there we are. [chuckles]
This lock is a bit tricky.
-[George] Wow, beautiful. -[Catherine sighs]
-[woman] Okay. -[George] Huh?
As I told George last week, it's from the late 1800s.
translation.zh:
‎我上周跟乔治说过
‎这栋房子建于19世纪末

translation.en: [woman] There's definitely updating that needs to be done.
translation.zh: ‎这里肯定有一些需要升级改造的地方

translation.en: Yes, certainly could use a paint job.
translation.zh: ‎是的 绝对需要重新粉刷

translation.en: Yeah, but look at these bones, huh? Amazing!
translation.zh: ‎是的 但是看看这些结构 太棒了！

translation.en: You have to have a real vision for an old place like this.
translation.zh:
‎要改建这样的老房子
‎需要有一个懂行的人

translation.en: Well, my wife is a trained art restorer, so we're in good hands.
translation.zh:
‎我妻子是受过训练的艺术品修复师
‎这个问题应该难不倒我们

translation.en: Why would someone just leave this here?
translation.zh: ‎为什么会有人把这架钢琴丢在这里？

translation.en: This is so beautiful.
[sighs] Dairy farmers everywhere are falling on hard times.
-It's a-- a tough business these days. -[piano notes]
[sighs] So sad.
It is sad.
[George] We'll make it happy.
You wanna see the rest, don't you? Come on.
translation.zh: ‎你还想看看其他地方 对吧？来吧

translation.en: Show it to me.
-[Catherine] Show me the upstairs. -[George] Okay, upstairs.
translation.zh:
‎-带我看看楼上 乔治
‎-好的 楼上

translation.en: [Catherine] How big is it?
[Catherine] Hey. Remember this?
-[Catherine] Here. This is right… -[George] Okay.
Hey, uh, George,
I was gonna put your little seascapes, you know, above the piano, -but I-- I can't find them. -Oh.
translation.zh:
‎我本想把你的海景画放在钢琴上面的
‎但我找不到了

translation.en: -Sorry. I packed them for my office. -Aw.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我把画打包寄到我的办公室了

translation.en: I love those things.
Yeah, I thought it would show off a relic of my former life. Oh!
translation.zh:
‎我觉得那些画
‎能让我炫耀一下以往生活的痕迹

translation.en: You know, maybe this house is going to inspire you to start painting again.
translation.zh: ‎或许这栋房子会激励你再次开始作画

translation.en: Mm, nah, I think, since my dissertation, I… I really see myself as a writer.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得不会 自从写完论文
‎我就觉得自己是作家了

translation.en: Okay, the cat or the doll?
Which one?
I think she's finally out.
Are you stressed about tomorrow?
Yeah-- No. Should I be?
Well, first day jitters are a normal human reaction.
translation.zh: ‎上班第一天紧张是正常人类的反应

translation.en: Are you looking for a reason to de-stress?
-Do I need a reason? -No.
How do you want me to de-stress you?
What?
What is that smell?
You smell that? It smells like car exhaust fumes.
-Right? -Yeah, I… I guess I smell… smell it.
translation.zh:
‎-对吧？
‎-对 我好像也闻到了

translation.en: And it's getting stronger.
Do you think ghosts use premium unleaded?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得鬼魂会用优质无铅汽油吗？

translation.en: I'm serious, George. Stop.
translation.zh: ‎我是认真的 乔治 别闹

translation.en: -Mommy, Mommy, I'm scared! -[Catherine] Oh God! It's okay. Oh!
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 我好害怕！ ‎-没事的 过来
‎-我好害怕！

translation.en: -Come here. -I'm scared!
-Tuck in, baby girl. All right. -[George sighs]
translation.zh: ‎钻进来吧 宝贝 好了

translation.en: Wait, really?
Mommy, I'm scared. I don't wanna sleep in there.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 我好害怕 我不想在那里睡

translation.en: [George] America's Rhine.
[inhales deeply] Oh, it is a dream setting for a campus.
translation.zh: ‎这里是一个很理想的校园环境

translation.en: Full disclosure, Claire.
Your chapter on how Swedenborg influenced the art of George Inness
translation.zh:
‎你写的史威登堡如何影响
‎乔治·英尼斯艺术风格的章节

translation.en: is what landed you here.
[chuckles] Swedenborg, really? That's… that's interesting.
translation.zh: ‎史威登堡 真的吗？那倒是有趣

translation.en: It's the part of my dissertation I struggled with the most.
translation.zh: ‎那是我论文中最纠结的一个部分

translation.en: How so?
[inhales sharply] Uh, I-I guess I'm a bit of a cliché, the New York cynic.
translation.zh:
‎我想我有些老生常谈了
‎就像纽约犬儒学派的人

translation.en: That… How a-a painter as brilliant as Inness
translation.zh: ‎说…像英尼斯那样聪慧的画师

translation.en: could fall for some 18th-century mystic still baffles me.
translation.zh: ‎怎么会对18世纪的神秘主义者感兴趣 ‎我至今依然感到迷惑

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, Swedenborg…
translation.zh: ‎我至今依然感到迷惑 ‎史威登堡…

translation.en: He wasn't just some mystic.
He keenly understood that everything in the natural world
has a counterpart in the spiritual realm.
translation.zh: ‎都在精神国度中有对应的事物

translation.en: And Inness painted landscapes with this in mind.
translation.zh: ‎英尼斯画风景画时脑中带着这种想法

translation.en: I-I get that.
Oh, this is my office in case you need me.
translation.zh: ‎如果你需要找我 这是我的办公室

translation.en: -Wow, beautiful. -Mh-hm.
My-- my trouble with Swedenborg is his communicating with angels and ghosts.
translation.zh:
‎我对史威登堡的疑问是
‎他与天使和鬼魂的交流

translation.en: Glorifying death as this… as this grand passage.
translation.zh: ‎将死亡美化成一条金光大道

translation.en: You should know that Swedenborg still has a devoted following
translation.zh:
‎你应该知道史威登堡
‎在这个领域依然有

translation.en: in this neck of the woods, myself included.
translation.zh: ‎虔诚的跟随者 包括我本人

translation.en: We even have séances on occasion. I'll invite you.
translation.zh:
‎我们偶尔还会举办降神会
‎我会邀请你的

translation.en: [chuckles] I'll-- I will bring my wife.
She is the… the true believer of the family.
Well, this is your office right here.
[man] I guess I picked the wrong welcome gift.
translation.zh: ‎看来我选错了欢迎你的礼物

translation.en: [George chuckles] Well, I… I can't argue with the cover art.
translation.zh:
‎（《所见所闻》
‎伊曼纽·史威登堡著） ‎封面这幅画还是不错的

translation.en: The Valley of the Shadow of Death.
Ahh, that is George Inness at his best.
translation.zh: ‎《死荫的幽谷》 ‎这就是乔治·英尼斯的巅峰之作

translation.en: Well, you are now officially in Inness territory.
translation.zh:
‎好了 你现在
‎正式进入英尼斯的领地了

translation.en: Don't be surprised if you start seeing things his way.
translation.zh:
‎如果你开始以他的视角看事物
‎不要意外

translation.en: Thank you, Floyd.
-[Catherine] Hi. -Hello.
Mrs. Claire, right? Yeah, can I help you?
translation.zh:
‎-克莱尔太太 对吧？
‎-对 有什么需要？

translation.en: Uh, yes, ma'am.
My name's Eddie Lucks, and this here's my younger brother Cole.
translation.zh: ‎我叫艾迪·拉克斯 这是我弟弟科尔

translation.en: We just wanted to introduce ourselves in case you're in need of a hired hand.
translation.zh:
‎我们只是想来让你认识一下
‎说不定你需要雇人帮忙

translation.en: We do gardening, carpentry, plumbing.
When it comes to painting, we're regular Leonardos.
translation.zh: ‎至于粉刷 我们就是当代达芬奇

translation.en: -Best part of all is, we come real cheap. -Hey, like my marble?
translation.zh: ‎最棒的是 我们的费用很低 ‎喜欢我的弹珠吗？

translation.en: Yeah, nice. You want me to show you how to shoot?
translation.zh:
‎喜欢 很漂亮
‎你想看看我怎么打弹珠吗？

translation.en: Oh, I forgot to mention that Cole is the best babysitter in town.
translation.zh:
‎我还忘记说了
‎科尔是镇上最棒的育儿保姆

translation.en: Yeah, I can see that. Where do you boys live?
translation.zh: ‎是啊 看出来了 你们两个住在哪里？

translation.en: In town with our uncle.
translation.zh: ‎在镇上和我们舅舅住在一起

translation.en: We got plenty of references if that's what you need.
translation.zh: ‎如果你需要推荐人 我们可以找很多

translation.en: Okay. Do you have a business card?
-A card? Um… -[Franny and Cole chatting indistinctly]
Let me see.
Oh, I left my business cards at home. [chuckles]
-I got a pen. -[Franny] Yeah!
I think we should just hire them.
Shouldn't we get one more quote? There's a lot of other groundskeepers in town.
translation.zh:
‎我们不应该再找别人问问吗？
‎镇上有很多园丁

translation.en: I already did, and they… run like half the price.
translation.zh:
‎我已经问过了
‎他们的价格是别人的一半

translation.en: Cath, please don't tell me you're back on the whole salads-only thing.
translation.zh: ‎千万别告诉我 你又开始只吃沙拉了

translation.en: I ate a big lunch today.
What about the protein shakes the doctor recommended?
translation.zh: ‎医生推荐的那个蛋白质奶昔呢？

translation.en: I saw you skipped it this morning.
I am doing them at night now because it's easier on my stomach.
translation.zh:
‎我现在改到晚上吃了
‎因为这样我的胃会更轻松

translation.en: -Franny, you want some more rice? -No, I want a pony ride.
translation.zh:
‎-弗兰妮 你想再吃点米饭吗？
‎-不想 我想要骑小马

translation.en: -[Franny] Go, pony, go! -[George] I am.
translation.zh:
‎-驾 小马 驾！
‎-我在走了

translation.en: [Franny] Go, pony, go!
[George] You are terrorizing.
Oh, look, there's another pony.
Okay. Ready?
-One, two, three. -Horsey.
-[Franny] Pony! -[George] Gosh.
-You coming? -Yeah, in a second. I have to do dishes.
translation.zh:
‎-你来吗？
‎-马上 我还要洗一下盘子

translation.en: Oh, can you get that pot for me, please?
translation.zh: ‎你能帮我把那个锅拿过来吗？

translation.en: -Thank you. I'll be up soon. -Okay.
Don't be long. I'm pretty tired.
"Damned."
George.
Hey, George. George.
I'm a-- I'm asleep.
-[woman 1] Where? -[woman 2] Eight.
-[woman 1] Three pounds is a lot. -You've got to be telling--
translation.zh:
‎-三磅很多啊
‎-不是 你要说出…

translation.en: Company.
Hi. Are you the Historical Society?
translation.zh: ‎你们好 你们是历史学会的吗？

translation.en: Indeed we are.
Um, I don't know if you need volunteers,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你们是否需要志愿者

translation.en: but I'm new in town, and I would love to meet people
translation.zh: ‎但我是镇上新来的 我想多认识人

translation.en: and possibly learn more about the area.
Write your information down.
Okay.
[blind woman] We'll send you a schedule.
And also, I was curious
if you had any information on some of the older homes in the area,
translation.zh:
‎你们是否知道这片地区
‎一些老房子的信息

translation.en: being that I just bought one.
Actually, there's a picture of your house hanging up.
translation.zh: ‎其实这里挂了一张你家的照片

translation.en: -Really? Where? -Yeah.
In the other room. The couple who built it is in it, too.
translation.zh:
‎在另一个房间
‎还有建造那栋房子的夫妻也在照片上

translation.en: The original ones,
long before the Vayle family.
I… I'm going to go take a look. Thanks.
-[Franny] He doesn't look like a cat. -[George] He does.
-[Franny] His ears are so little. -[George] It's called Cat in the Hat.
translation.zh:
‎-这本书叫《戴帽子的猫》
‎-他的耳朵好小

translation.en: -And his nose and stuff like that. -He's got a normal nose.
translation.zh:
‎-还有他的鼻子之类的 长成那样
‎-他鼻子很正常

translation.en: [Franny giggles] But it's so little!
You know he killed someone?
Over a game of tennis.
Who? Caravaggio.
Oh, well, I'm not surprised.
People get away with all kinds of horrible things.
translation.zh:
‎人们做各种恐怖的事情
‎都能逃脱刑罚

translation.en: Are you speaking from personal experience?
So are you studying art? I-I teach over at Saginaw.
translation.zh: ‎你学习艺术？我在塞基诺教课

translation.en: Oh God. No.
No, I was just… looking for T-shirt ideas.
I'm all about literature in school. Which school?
translation.zh:
‎-我在学校对文学最感兴趣
‎-哪个学校？

translation.en: Cornell.
Oh, that's quite a commute.
Just taking a little hiatus.
Riding for rich folk at Crow Hill Stables.
translation.zh: ‎在乌鸦山马场陪有钱人骑马

translation.en: Yeah, I know that place.
It's right next to the tennis club. I play there sometimes.
translation.zh:
‎就在网球俱乐部旁边
‎我有时候会在那里打网球

translation.en: Oh. Well, uh… I hope you're a better loser than Caravaggio.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你没有卡拉瓦乔糟糕

translation.en: George Claire.
Right.
Right. Claire.
Yeah, my friend Eddie does your yard work.
translation.zh:
‎对 我的朋友艾迪
‎在你那里整理院子

translation.en: I think your wife hired him.
Is that your little girl?
Yeah, that's Franny.
Hi there, Franny. How's that book?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 弗兰妮 这本书怎么样？

translation.en: What does this say?
Let's see.
Okay, it says…
"He should not be here. He should not be about."
translation.zh: ‎“他不应该在这里 他不应该来这里

translation.en: "He should not be here when your mother is out."
translation.zh:
‎你妈妈不在家的时候
‎他不应该在这里”

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Franny.
[George] Okay, ready to go?
George?
George?
George, you're not going to believe the picture I just saw.
translation.zh: ‎你绝对无法相信我看到了什么照片

translation.en: -[Eddie] Wanna go to the pond? -[Franny] Yeah!
[Eddie] You wanna go swim?
-[Cole] Come on, Franny. Gonna catch you! -[Franny] No!
translation.zh: ‎走吧 弗兰妮 我要来抓你了！

translation.en: -[Cole] I'm gonna throw you in! -[Franny] No!
[Eddie] Hey Franny, watch out for the snapping turtles, okay?
translation.zh: ‎弗兰妮 小心鳄龟 好吗？

translation.en: All right? It's down my butt! It's got my butt!
translation.zh:
‎好吗？我的屁股！
‎它咬住了我的屁股！

translation.en: -[Franny laughs] -Didn't they say summer's officially over?
translation.zh: ‎他们没说夏天正式结束了吗？

translation.en: Our seasons play by their own rules up here.
translation.zh: ‎我们这里的季节有自己的规则

translation.en: Who knows? It could snow tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎谁知道呢？说不定明天就会下雪

translation.en: Well, I brought some lemonade to help you guys cool off,
translation.zh: ‎我带了一点柠檬水 帮你们凉快一下

translation.en: but it looks like you're way ahead of me.
translation.zh: ‎但看来你们早就想办法凉快了

translation.en: You should come on in. The water's great.
Believe me,
it looks very tempting.
You know what they say about temptation. Easiest way to kill it's just to give in.
translation.zh:
‎你知道大家是怎样说诱惑的
‎扼杀诱惑最好的办法是屈服

translation.en: [Catherine] So what does your uncle do?
He's a hearse driver.
I guess every town needs one of those.
translation.zh: ‎应该每个小镇都需要一位灵车司机

translation.en: Can I ask about your parents?
Um… both dead. Car accident.
Oh God, I'm so sorry.
Yeah, I mean, it was something.
It makes a kid grow up fast.
Cole's on good track for college, though.
And what about you?
Nah, that stuff's not really in my cards.
translation.zh: ‎学习什么的 我真的不太行

translation.en: I mean, I did want to study music…
-Really? What instruments do you play? -…but…
All kinds. I-- I have a beat-up guitar right now.
translation.zh: ‎各种乐器 我现在有一个旧吉他

translation.en: We have a piano at the house. I just got it tuned.
translation.zh: ‎我们有一架钢琴 我刚调好音

translation.en: It'd be nice to have someone who can actually play it. I'm pathetic.
translation.zh:
‎如果有人能弹奏 那就太好了
‎我弹得很烂

translation.en: [chuckles] All right. Well, thanks, Mrs. Claire.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 谢谢你 克莱尔太太

translation.en: -Catherine. Sorry. -It's okay.
You'll get used to it.
-[students laughing] -Yeah. Please do not tell him I said that.
All right.
Okay, so, the Hudson River School painters.
Landscapes as the realm of the soul.
If you keep reading around the subject, you'll find it really rewarding. Really.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们一直阅读这个主题的作品
‎会发现它真的很有意义

translation.en: -Keep going, okay? -Thank you so much.
-We will. -Bye!
George Claire?
Yes. Hello. Can I help you?
translation.zh: ‎是的 你好 有什么事吗？

translation.en: Justine Sokolov. Adjunct weaving instructor.
translation.zh: ‎贾丝廷·索科洛夫 兼职编织课讲师

translation.en: You play tennis with my husband Bram.
translation.zh: ‎你和我丈夫布拉姆一起玩网球

translation.en: Bram?
Oh, Bram, of course. Yes. He mentioned that his wife teaches here.
translation.zh:
‎布拉姆 哦 对
‎他提过 他妻子在这里教课

translation.en: I hear you've developed a cult-like following already in our department.
translation.zh:
‎我听说你在我们系
‎已经有了一群狂热的追随者

translation.en: So I… Oh, this you?
translation.zh: ‎所以我… 这是你的办公室吗？

translation.en: I thought I'd invite you and your wife over and see what all the fuss is about.
translation.zh:
‎我考虑邀请你和你妻子过来
‎看看到底是怎么回事

translation.en: That sounds really nice. [chuckles]
You know, it'd be nice for my wife to meet a few more Saginaw folk, too, so yeah.
translation.zh:
‎让我妻子
‎多见几个塞基诺的同事也不错 好啊

translation.en: Excellent. I have your number in the registry,
translation.zh: ‎太好了 教务处有你家电话

translation.en: so I'll give the missus a call.
-Fantastic. -George Claire.
Wow. You painted these?
Yeah, a long time ago.
I gave up the whole fine arts thing to focus on theory.
translation.zh: ‎我放弃了实用美术 专攻理论部分

translation.en: Realized I wasn't really up to snuff.
I disagree.
These are confidently executed, and they are… quite unique.
translation.zh:
‎这些画作完成得非常好
‎而且都非常独特

translation.en: Thank you.  Uh, you should see my wife's stuff. She's the real artist of the family.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 你应该看看我妻子的画作
‎她才是我们家真正的艺术家

translation.en: Okay, I look forward to it. I'll be in touch, George Claire.
translation.zh:
‎好的 我很期待欣赏她的画作
‎我们回头联系 乔治·克莱尔

translation.en: [groans] What's wrong? That smell. It's-- it's getting stronger.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？
‎-那个气味越来越强烈了

translation.en: Yeah, I figured it out. It's 'cause we're above the garage.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我搞清楚了
‎那是因为我们就在车库的上面

translation.en: I'll get some fans and air it out in the morning.
translation.zh:
‎我明天早上去找些风扇
‎把气味吹出去

translation.en: But why does it come and go?
translation.zh: ‎但为什么气味会时有时无的？

translation.en: Cath, please stop with the ghost stuff.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟 别再想那些鬼魂的事情了

translation.en: I'm not gonna let you put a negative spin on this house.
translation.zh:
‎我不会让你对这栋房子
‎有任何负面想法的

translation.en: -[Franny screams] Mommy, where are you? -[gasps]
Mommy, I'm scared, I'm scared! -Mommy! -Hey, hey! Shh.
-What happened? -What is going on? Where were you?
translation.zh:
‎-发生什么了？
‎-到底怎么回事？你去哪里了？

translation.en: -What happened? Tell me. -I saw the lady, Mommy. I'm scared.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉我怎么回事
‎-我看见了一个女人 妈妈 我害怕

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. Don't worry.
-Mommy's here. You can sleep with us. -Oh God. Cath, again?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈在这儿呢 你可以和我们一起睡 ‎凯瑟 又一起睡？

translation.en: If we filled out her sedative prescription like the pediatrician said,
translation.zh:
‎如果我们像儿科医生说的那样
‎给她开一些镇静剂

translation.en: this wouldn't keep happening.
translation.zh: ‎这种情况就不会一直发生了

translation.en: I said to you ten times I don't feel good giving her unnecessary medications.
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说过很多次
‎给她开一些不必要的药物 ‎我觉得不好

translation.en: It's this house.
Oh God. You two sleep in there. I'll take Franny's room.
translation.zh:
‎你们两个睡在这里
‎我去弗兰妮的房间睡

translation.en: Daddy's mad at me.
[gasps] No! No, no, no, he's not.
No, sweetheart. Not at you.
translation.zh: ‎没有 宝贝 他不是生你的气

translation.en: [Eddie] It's gotta feel good.
I guess, yeah.
Uh, guess who I ran into the other day?
Who?
Your boss, George Claire.
-Oh, yeah? -Yeah.
I haven't met the guy officially yet. What's he like?
translation.zh:
‎我还没有正式见过那个人
‎他什么样？

translation.en: Dishonest.
Deceitful.
[chuckles] How would you know that?
Because I found him attractive.
[Cole] Here we go!
You wanna watch Eddie chop wood?
[Franny] Yeah!
Chop.
Chop.
Chop.
"All of us on Earth are associated
with those in the spiritual world who are like ourselves."
translation.zh:
‎都与那些灵魂世界中
‎和我们相似的人有关联

translation.en: "We are, in a sense, united to them."
translation.zh:
‎我们从某种意义上说
‎和他们是一致的”

translation.en: [ghostly voice] United to them…
-[chopping wood continues] -[Catherine] What do you want?
What are you looking for here?
[chuckling] I… I don't really know.
You're a presumptuous fucker, aren't you?
translation.zh: ‎你是个自负的混蛋 不是吗？

translation.en: If you're coming in, shut the door behind you.
translation.zh: ‎如果你进来 就关上身后的门

translation.en: He's got a social life at that school, and I'm isolated.
translation.zh:
‎他在那个学校有社交生活
‎而我却是与世隔绝的

translation.en: [woman] Something's wrong. I can hear it in your voice.
translation.zh:
‎出什么事了
‎我能从你的声音中听出来

translation.en: I…
I'm starting… to see things.
And I'm scared to tell George about it.
-Catherine, have you been eating? -[sighs]
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟琳 你最近吃饭了吗？

translation.en: What's the church like up there? Have you prayed on any of this?
translation.zh:
‎那边的教会怎么样？
‎你在哪个教会祈祷了吗？

translation.en: Try to remember how he did right by marrying--
translation.zh: ‎要记得他做得非常对 结婚…

translation.en: Oh, I gotta go. Thanks a lot for the pep talk, Mom. I love you.
translation.zh:
‎我得挂了 谢谢你鼓励我
‎妈妈 我爱你

translation.en: [Catherine] That was some run.
Yeah, I guess I went pretty far. I don't know what came over me.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 看来是我跑太远了
‎我真不知道自己是怎么了

translation.en: And then I-I got distracted by these wildflowers.
Thanks, but now you're going to be late for class.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 但是现在你上课要迟到了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know. I-I'd better hustle.
translation.zh: ‎是 我知道 我最好快点了

translation.en: [Cole] Look who's home.
Hey.
-[Cole] What are you doing? -One sec.
Mr. Claire, right?
It's nice to finally meet you. I'm Eddie.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴终于见到你了 我是艾迪

translation.en: -My brother and I are about to get-- -The Vayle boys, aren't you?
translation.zh:
‎-我和我弟弟正要来刷底漆…
‎-你们是维尔兄弟 是吧？

translation.en: Not anymore, sir.
We go by Lucks now. Took our uncle's last name.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在姓拉克斯
‎跟了我舅舅的姓氏

translation.en: Do me a favor. My… my wife doesn't know that you lived here. Uh, or what happened.
translation.zh:
‎帮我个忙 我妻子不知道
‎你以前住这里 也不知道发生过什么

translation.en: I think it would be better if we kept it that way.
translation.zh: ‎我们最好继续保守这个秘密

translation.en: Uh, she's a nervous woman and, uh…
well, she wouldn't want you around if she found out.
translation.zh: ‎如果她发现了 就不会让你来了

translation.en: Sure, Mr. Claire.
My brother and I are only here for honest work.
translation.zh: ‎我和我弟弟是来这里诚信工作的

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
It seems a… little odd, no?
That you'd want to be here at all.
Taking care of this house comes second nature to us.
translation.zh:
‎照顾这栋房子
‎我们已经非常熟悉 自然而然了

translation.en: Right.
Did you meet your husband in art school?
translation.zh: ‎你是在艺术学校认识你丈夫的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we were undergrads together.
That's cool.
[Catherine] Were your parents supportive of you studying music?
translation.zh: ‎你父母当初支持你学习音乐吗？

translation.en: Yeah, my mom was the one who taught me.
But when my father found my application, he, uh… he beat me with a two-by-four.
translation.zh:
‎但是我爸爸发现我的入学申请之后
‎用木棒打了我

translation.en: Are you serious?
Yeah.
Yeah, he actually bloodied me up pretty good.
Well, if you decide to reapply to music school,
translation.zh: ‎如果你决定重新申请音乐学校

translation.en: I will personally write you a check for your application.
translation.zh:
‎我个人非常愿意给你写一张支票
‎帮你支付申请费用

translation.en: You really got me.
-Hey, George. -[music stops]
Eddie-- Eddie was just playing his favorite Louis Armstrong song for me.
translation.zh:
‎艾迪刚才为我弹奏他最喜欢的
‎路易斯·阿姆斯特朗歌曲

translation.en: -Called-- What's it called? -"Someday You'll Be Sorry."
translation.zh:
‎-叫什么来着？
‎-《你终有一天会后悔》

translation.en: [chuckling] That's right. That's the story of my life.
What a surprise.
Eddie was telling me earlier how he was here for honest work.
translation.zh: ‎艾迪之前还说 他来这里是诚信工作

translation.en: I-- I didn't realize that it included entertainment.
We finished painting, sir,
and, uh, Mrs. Claire asked me to play something before I left.
translation.zh: ‎克莱尔太太让我走之前弹奏一曲

translation.en: -So-- -Wait, Eddie, Eddie.
Come on, please. Don't stop on my account.
translation.zh: ‎继续吧 不要因为我停止

translation.en: I've been called many things before, but never a party pooper.
translation.zh:
‎别人给过我很多称呼
‎但是从来没有人说我是派对的扫兴者

translation.en: Well, the man of the house has spoken,
so finish the goddamn song, Eddie.
translation.zh: ‎所以弹完这首该死的曲子 艾迪

translation.en: Yeah, please.
Shit.
Oh God.
-[ghostly voice] Catherine. -[gasps, gags]
[George] What you do to me, you do not know.
translation.zh: ‎你对我做了什么 你根本不知道

translation.en: My God.
I've never done anything like this before, you know.
translation.zh:
‎我以前从来没有做过这种事
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: What's wrong?
What? I'm just talking.
-Sharing. -What the fuck is wrong with me?
-Why do I keep doing this? -Hey, Willis, I'm being serious.
translation.zh:
‎-我为什么一直做这种事？
‎-维利斯 我是认真的

translation.en: It'd be nice to know you a bit better.
translation.zh: ‎多了解你一点 感觉会很好

translation.en: Some ordinary, regular things.
That's not what this is about.
Ow! What the hell?
You think because I fuck you, I'm fooled by you?
translation.zh: ‎你以为我睡了你 就是被你耍了？

translation.en: I've been around guys like you my whole life.
translation.zh: ‎我一辈子身边都是你这种人

translation.en: -What the hell are you talking about? -My dad made a fortune defending them.
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-我爸爸给他们辩护 赚了不少钱

translation.en: Thieves, con men, psychopaths.
And they all got off because that's the way the world works for men.
translation.zh:
‎他们都脱罪了 因为这个世界中
‎男人就是能为所欲为

translation.en: Okay, look, I see that you have some pretty awful ideas about men.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我明白你对男人的印象不好

translation.en: I have awful ideas about everything.
Now get the fuck up.
-Come on, Willis. -No.
I'm done with this.
Willis! Willis!
Willis!
-[Justine] Hi! -Trick or treat?
-Come in, come in. -Hello, I'm Catherine.
-Oh, of course you are. Mmm. -Oh.
[chuckles] George, hi.
-Hi. For you. -Oh, thank you.
Bram, where are you? The Claires have arrived.
translation.zh:
‎布拉姆 亲爱的 你在哪儿？
‎克莱尔夫妇来了

translation.en: -Wow. -[Bram] I'm here.
translation.zh:
‎布拉姆 亲爱的 你在哪儿？
‎克莱尔夫妇来了 ‎-我来了
‎-太好了

translation.en: [George] Amazing.
-[Justine] Thanks. -Hello.
-I'm Catherine. -Hey, Bram.
translation.zh:
‎-我是凯瑟琳
‎-嗨 我是布拉姆

translation.en: -Thanks for having us. -Look what they brought us.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你招待我们
‎-看看他们给我们带来了什么

translation.en: -Thank you. How are you? -Very well.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 乔治 你过得好吗？
‎-很好

translation.en: -Come on in. -Beautiful.
-Thank you. -I love your artwork.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-我很喜欢你的艺术作品

translation.en: Ah. Well, yes. We're just enjoying our tenure here while it lasts.
translation.zh: ‎只要我们还住在这里就好好享用

translation.en: -Oh, do you rent? -No, no, no.
translation.zh:
‎-你们的房子是租来的吗？
‎-不是

translation.en: [laughing] He just means how these old Hudson Valley homes are.
translation.zh:
‎他是在说
‎这些哈德逊谷的房子就是这样

translation.en: We think we own them, we're just caretakers.
translation.zh:
‎我们以为拥有它们
‎但其实我们只是照顾它们

translation.en: [laughing] They outlive us all.
translation.zh:
‎我们以为拥有它们
‎但其实我们只是照顾它们 ‎它们比我们活得都长

translation.en: My wife thinks ours is haunted.
translation.zh: ‎我妻子觉得我们家房子闹鬼了

translation.en: -Well, she's probably right. -[laughs] They're all haunted a bit.
translation.zh:
‎说不定她是对的
‎这种房子都有点闹鬼

translation.en: After all, we're in Headless Horseman country.
translation.zh:
‎毕竟我们是在
‎《无头骑士》发生的国家

translation.en: [laughs] Let me take your coats.
Oh, actually, we should go outside and look at the alpacas before they nap.
translation.zh:
‎其实我们应该出去看看那些羊驼
‎不然一会儿它们要打瞌睡了

translation.en: -Oh, yes. -This way.
-You'll love it. -Alpacas nap?
translation.zh:
‎-你们会喜欢的
‎-羊驼会打瞌睡？

translation.en: Where does one buy such quality weed up here?
translation.zh: ‎这里哪儿能买到质量这么好的大麻？

translation.en: -[Bram] Buy? I grow it. -[George] Nice.
You know, I came up here to write the Great American Novel, but…
translation.zh:
‎其实 我来这里
‎是想写伟大美国小说 但是…

translation.en: I spend most of my time tending to my garden, if you get my drift.
translation.zh:
‎我的多数时间都用在了打理花园上
‎你应该懂我吧

translation.en: I love your setup. It's amazing.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢这里的布局 好漂亮

translation.en: -Aww, thank you. -And your work is so unique.
Thanks. It's gonna sound a little strange,
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 这话听起来可能有些奇怪

translation.en: but it's a spiritual thing for me, weaving.
translation.zh: ‎但编织对我来说是一种精神上的东西

translation.en: I tap into something cosmic when I'm working.
translation.zh: ‎我工作的时候会利用一下宇宙

translation.en: -Its patterns, you know? -Yeah. Sometimes I feel guilty taking credit for it.
translation.zh:
‎这种图案 你懂吧？有时候
‎我说这是自己创作的 都不太好意思

translation.en: Why? You shouldn't.
I would love for you to make something for my Franny.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你可以为弗兰妮织点什么

translation.en: -I'd pay you, naturally. -Don't be silly. I'll do it for cost.
translation.zh:
‎-我自然会付钱给你的
‎-别傻了 我只收成本价

translation.en: Oh, actually, George already asked for a scarf for his mother,
translation.zh:
‎事实上 乔治已经为他的妈妈
‎订了一条围巾

translation.en: so I'll just add it to that order.
translation.zh: ‎所以我会直接加在这个订单上

translation.en: Okay.
-You guys just have the one child? -Yeah. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你们只生了一个孩子吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: She's four. And you and Bram? Do you guys have kids?
translation.zh:
‎她四岁了 你和布拉姆呢？
‎你们有孩子吗？

translation.en: No.
Bram and I were conflicted about that for a while,
translation.zh:
‎布拉姆和我因为这个
‎有一段时间总是产生矛盾

translation.en: and then Mother Nature made the final decision.
And she made the right one.
It all worked out perfectly.
I was conflicted, too, but just like that, it…
translation.zh: ‎我之前也很矛盾 但是就那样…

translation.en: It happened.
And then we got married, which I was also conflicted about.
translation.zh:
‎然后我们结婚了
‎这一点我还是很矛盾

translation.en: I guess you could say I'm a conflicted Catholic girl at heart,
translation.zh:
‎我内心应该就是那种
‎矛盾的天主教女孩吧

translation.en: dutifully going through the motions.
translation.zh: ‎像完成任务一样走人生的各个阶段

translation.en: You know,
the first few years of our marriage
were a complete blur because of the baby and school.
translation.zh:
‎因为宝宝和学校的问题
‎完全是一团糟

translation.en: We're really still trying to catch our breath up here.
translation.zh: ‎我们到现在依然还没有喘过气来

translation.en: You know, I attend this women's group.
translation.zh: ‎其实我参加了一个女性团体

translation.en: It's an Arts Club… thing.
We meet once a month up in Albany,
translation.zh: ‎我们每个月在奥尔巴尼见一次

translation.en: and there are so many creative ladies to meet, Catherine.
translation.zh:
‎那里有好多
‎有创意的女性可以认识 凯瑟琳

translation.en: I think you should come with me.
I would love something like that.
I don't know anybody up here.
Well, you do now.
It must be so nice
to inherit a fortune
and then spend all day not writing a book.
I really like them, especially her. She's so interesting.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很喜欢他们 尤其是女主人
‎她真的好有趣

translation.en: She's so free with herself and her body.
translation.zh: ‎她的精神和她的身体都好自由

translation.en: She can certainly put away some lasagna.
-That's a nasty thing to say. -Come on, I'm kidding.
translation.zh:
‎-你这样说就不好了
‎-不至于吧 我开玩笑的

translation.en: I like them, too.
I especially like…
[sniffs] …Bram's weed.
Are you sure you're okay to drive after smoking so much?
translation.zh:
‎你确定你抽了那么多之后
‎还能开车吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
-I'm fine. I'm more than okay. -Really?
translation.zh:
‎-我很好 我好得不行
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: -Watch this. -[engine accelerating]
George, slow down.
-Slow down, George. -Really? -Really? -George, slow down!
[yelling] Slow down!
-[Catherine] Stop, George! -[George] Whoo!
God, what the hell are you doing?
What? What, I'm just having a little fun.
translation.zh: ‎什么？我只是觉得这样很好玩

translation.en: You remember what that was like, Cath, huh?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得那是什么感觉吗 凯瑟？

translation.en: -That's not funny! -[laughing] Come on.
Oh, come on, Cath. Cath!
Catherine!
Cath, where are you going? Come on, get back in the car.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟琳 你要去哪儿？ ‎拜托 坐回车上吧

translation.en: -Cath! -Get your hands off me!
God, we are two smart people.
-We should've known better. -Known what?
translation.zh:
‎-我们早就应该知道的
‎-知道什么？

translation.en: That I'm only here for the imaginary book jacket bio
translation.zh:
‎我来到这里
‎只是为了你脑中构想的那个

translation.en: that you have in your fucking head.
The-- the-- the professor with the wife and the country home.
translation.zh: ‎教授和妻子 还有他们乡下的家

translation.en: I gave up everything for you!
Oh God, I'm so sorry.  I'm so sorry I fucked up both of our lives!
translation.zh:
‎天啊 真抱歉
‎我毁掉了我们两个的人生！

translation.en: And the worst part is this is all I have.
translation.zh: ‎最糟糕的是 我拥有的就只有这个了

translation.en: Cath, you know what you do have? Is the crying drunks.
translation.zh:
‎凯瑟 你知道你拥有什么吗？
‎喝醉酒大哭

translation.en: You are a person who should not drink alcohol,
especially when you do not fucking eat anything!
Oh my God. I am so sick of everybody blaming everything
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我真的受够了 因为我不吃东西

translation.en: in my fucking life on me not eating!
translation.zh:
‎每个人都在责怪
‎我这该死人生中的一切

translation.en: Please, get back in the goddamn car!
-Get off of me! -[cries out] Ow!
Fuck!
-[groans] -Oh my God. Cath?
Oh my God. Cath…
I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. Was that…
Did I… Did I…
Cath?
Cath, are you okay?
Come on, Cole. Get up. I'll drive you home.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 科尔 起来 我开车送你回家

translation.en: [George] Hey, Cath?
I didn't mean to hurt you.
I would never hurt you.
But I also…
I have not been sensitive to your needs for some time.
translation.zh: ‎我确实很久没有顾及你的需求了

translation.en: And for that, I owe you an apology.
More than an apology.
One thing I do know…
[voice breaks] …is I love you.
-[glass shatters] -[Franny] What was that?
Oh God. Jesus. What?
[Catherine] It's okay, baby.
[whispering] Nothing happened. It's okay. It's okay.
[woman] "We look at each other, and we are not ashamed."
translation.zh: ‎“我们看着彼此 并不羞愧

translation.en: "I wearing the face of the proper marriage,
you the face of the independent woman."
"We cleaved to each other across that space."
translation.zh: ‎我们在那个空间里紧挨彼此”

translation.en: [George] You're back later than I thought. Am I?
translation.zh:
‎-我没想到你回家这么晚
‎-是吗？

translation.en: The fridge is empty.
I can go out, pick up some food for us.
-What do you feel like? -I, uh… I ate with Justine.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得呢？
‎-我和贾丝廷吃过了

translation.en: [George] Brilliant setting for a faculty meeting, Floyd.
translation.zh: ‎（塞基诺学院 下船坡道） ‎弗洛伊德 教师会议这样进行 真惬意

translation.en: [Floyd] Yes. I take her out alone a lot, which would seem selfish.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我总是一个人开船航行
‎那样看起来有点自私

translation.en: I used to sail a bit myself. Grew up on the Connecticut coast.
translation.zh:
‎我以前自己也航行
‎我是在康涅狄格州海岸边长大的

translation.en: Oh, that's right. Do your family own a boat?
I inherited my cousin's. The Lost Horizon.
translation.zh: ‎我继承了表哥的船 消失的地平线号

translation.en: He actually drowned while sailing it.
translation.zh: ‎他其实是航行的时候溺水了

translation.en: Oh, how sad.
Yeah. Only 19.
-Mm. -Already so sophisticated.
I remember when he died.
I stole his diary after the funeral. Read it repeatedly.
translation.zh:
‎我在葬礼之后偷了他的日记
‎一遍一遍反复读

translation.en: I know it's-- it's an awful thing to do,
but I… I think I needed some sort of… connection.
translation.zh: ‎但我想 我需要和他有一点联系

translation.en: Did you learn anything from it?
Yeah, a little.
He was gay, unhappy.
translation.zh: ‎他是同性恋 一直不开心

translation.en: Typical tortured artist.
translation.zh: ‎典型的那种精神饱受折磨的艺术家

translation.en: And then all that angst
one unfortunate moment vanishes forever.
translation.zh: ‎都在那不幸的一瞬间永远消失了

translation.en: We're all so inconsequential, Floyd.
translation.zh: ‎我们都是这么微不足道 弗洛伊德

translation.en: Swedenborg would suggest otherwise.
He'd say death is only the beginning.
Have you read the book yet?
[George] It's on the top of my list.
-[George] Come, come in. -Ahh. Cath?
Let me get that.
Hello.
Oh, Catherine, this is Floyd DeBeers, head of our department.
translation.zh:
‎凯瑟琳 这是弗洛伊德·德比尔斯
‎我们的系主任

translation.en: He also took me on this magnificent boat ride.
translation.zh: ‎他带我进行了一次壮丽的航船之旅

translation.en: So good to meet you.
So, in return, I invited him to our house, a very unfair trade.
translation.zh:
‎于是作为回报 我邀请他到我们家
‎这交易非常不公平

translation.en: -I've heard wonderful things about you. -As I have you.
George, is this some kind of setup?
[Catherine chuckles] What?
[chuckling] I-- I swear to God, I didn't even tell her you were coming.
translation.zh:
‎我对上帝发誓
‎我都没有告诉她你要来

translation.en: You see, George? You see? There are no coincidences.
translation.zh: ‎你看到了吗 乔治？这不是巧合

translation.en: I'm sorry. I-- I was taken by the artwork and just started reading it.
translation.zh:
‎我很抱歉 我被这幅画作迷住了
‎然后就开始阅读这本书

translation.en: [George] Nothing to be sorry for.
You do know what this is, don't you? The cover art?
translation.zh: ‎你知道这是什么吧？封面的这幅画？

translation.en: It's a soul transitioning into the afterlife.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个灵魂转化到来世的作品

translation.en: [Catherine] Really?
[Floyd] The painter followed Swedenborg,
so he believed that death is parallel to birth, but divine.
translation.zh:
‎所以他相信 死亡和出生类似
‎但却是神圣的

translation.en: [George] Floyd, believe me.
You do not want to get my wife started on all that, uh, stuff.
translation.zh: ‎你肯定不想让我妻子接触这些

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] Uh, Cath, please show Floyd around.
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟 你带弗洛伊德转转吧

translation.en: Um, I'm gonna fix us some cocktails.
May I show you around?
-I can't wait. -Great.
My daughter's asleep already,
but you can-- we can peek in her room.
translation.zh: ‎但我们可以看一眼她的房间

translation.en: We actually have four bedrooms, but we only use two of them.
translation.zh:
‎我们这里有四间卧室
‎但我们只用其中两间

translation.en: A young couple can't have too many bed--
translation.zh: ‎年轻的夫妻不能拥有太多床‎…

translation.en: You okay?
[whispering] We're not alone, are we?
What do you mean?
She doesn't mean any harm.
She has reasons for lingering.
[whispering] I've seen her, and so has my daughter.
translation.zh: ‎我见过她 我女儿也见过

translation.en: Because she's here for you.
-She wants you to know that. -[cries]
At first, I was terrified,
of course, but now…
translation.zh: ‎我当然会害怕了 但是现在…

translation.en: every time I sense her, I-- I feel…
translation.zh: ‎每次我察觉到她 我都感觉…

translation.en: comfort.
-I know that doesn't make any sense. -It makes perfect sense.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道这看似不合理
‎-很合理

translation.en: Her name is Smit, wife of Jacob Smit.
translation.zh:
‎她的名字叫斯密特
‎贾格布·斯密特的妻子

translation.en: He was a… um, a local minister.
They built this house, and that's all I can find at the library.
translation.zh:
‎他们建造了这栋房子
‎我在图书馆只能找到这些信息了

translation.en: Let me do some digging on campus.
You can't tell George because he can't know.
translation.zh: ‎你不能告诉乔治 他不能知道

translation.en: He thinks that I'm crazy.
No, of course not.
He's just afraid, you know.
Men at his stage of life often are.
translation.zh: ‎处于他这个人生阶段的男人常会如此

translation.en: But try and be patient, Catherine.
With love, he can catch up to you spiritually.
translation.zh:
‎用爱感化他 他对精神世界的理解
‎就能跟上你的脚步

translation.en: And let us…
Let us hold a séance here.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以在这里举行降神会

translation.en: -With or without George. -Really?
We can find out a little more about your housemate.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以多了解一点你这个室友

translation.en: [George] Bye, Floyd.
Good night, good night, and thanks for a wonderful evening.
translation.zh:
‎晚安 谢谢你
‎让我度过一个美好的夜晚

translation.en: [George] Drive safe.
My God, Cath, he absolutely adored you.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 凯瑟 他非常崇拜你

translation.en: I-- I have never seen Floyd light up like that around anyone.
translation.zh:
‎我从没见过弗洛伊德在别人身边
‎这么开心过

translation.en: And you were up there awhile. Did he say anything?
translation.zh:
‎你们在那里待了一会
‎他说什么了吗？

translation.en: About what?
About me?
He said that you were an exceptional professor.
And you are an exceptional wife,
which means the world to me.
translation.zh: ‎这对我来说就意味着整个世界

translation.en: Ah! I feel like having company was good for us.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得有人陪伴对我们来说有好处

translation.en: Yeah? We need this.
I, uh… I want to invite my whole department over.
translation.zh: ‎我想邀请整个系的同事都过来

translation.en: A-- a real party. What do you think?
translation.zh: ‎举办一场真正的派对 你觉得如何？

translation.en: I think we owe it to Franny to make this place a happy home.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得为了弗兰妮 我们应该把这里
‎变成一个幸福的家

translation.en: I'm not against it. I just think that we need to then also invite
translation.zh:
‎我并不反对 我就是觉得
‎我们还需要邀请

translation.en: the locals and our neighbors.
Neighbors? [chuckles] Really?
I need to feel like I'm in this community, George, not just your community.
translation.zh:
‎我需要感觉我生活在这个社区里
‎乔治 而不仅仅是你的社区

translation.en: Okay, let's do it.
Please tell me again why I'm carrying a Bundt cake.
translation.zh:
‎你再告诉我一次
‎我为什么要带着圆环蛋糕

translation.en: We're no good at parties. Speak for yourself.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不擅长参加派对
‎-只有你不擅长

translation.en: I am. Nobody wants the sheriff around when they're drunk.
translation.zh:
‎确实 谁喝多的时候
‎都不希望警长在身边

translation.en: Uh, more wine?
Hi. Wine?
A little. Just… just…
Oh! Okay, good.
She's a friend of Bram's.
She's also writing.
They both have been writing novels… Sorry. They both have been writing novels.
translation.zh: ‎对 他们两个都在写小说… 抱歉

translation.en: I first wore glasses when I was 13.
Oh, thank you. Thank you, young man.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 谢谢你 小伙子

translation.en: Yes. You've done a lot with this place.
translation.zh: ‎是 你对这个地方改造了不少

translation.en: I want you to meet my wife Millicent, the love of my life.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你见见我妻子麦乐森
‎我一辈子的挚爱

translation.en: It's incredibly nice to meet you.
I hear we might have a session in your home.
translation.zh: ‎我听说可能会在你家举办降神会

translation.en: Yeah, soon, I hope. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎对 希望尽快吧 谢谢

translation.en: George? Travis, Mare's husband.
translation.zh: ‎乔治？特拉维斯 梅尔的丈夫

translation.en: -A pleasure to meet you. -This is her best cake. [laughing] Oh, wow.
translation.zh:
‎-特拉维斯 见到你很高兴
‎-这是她做的最好的一块蛋糕

translation.en: Thank you. We'll put it right here.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我们就放在这里吧

translation.en: [Mare] Travis? Come here. You've got to hear this.
translation.zh: ‎特拉维斯？过来 你一定要听听这个

translation.en: Yes, dear.
Hm. I almost baked a cake.
Bram insisted there was something you might appreciate… even more.
translation.zh: ‎布拉姆坚持说你会有更喜欢的东西

translation.en: [sniffs] Oh, fantastic.
-[chuckles] -Um, shall we?
-Yeah. Why not? -Why not?
-This place looks marvelous, Catherine. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-这个地方看起来好棒 凯瑟琳
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Absolutely transformed.
Well, a little paint goes a really long way.
translation.zh: ‎粉刷一下就有这么大的改变

translation.en: [sighs] And it does my heart good to see Eddie and Cole here.
translation.zh: ‎看到艾迪和科尔在这里 我也很安心

translation.en: -You're a saint for having them back. -What do you mean?
translation.zh:
‎-你把他们请回来 真是圣人
‎-什么意思？

translation.en: Well, they grew up here.
You-- you knew that, didn't you?
I-I-It's just that
I told George the whole story when I first showed him the house and--
translation.zh:
‎第一次带乔治参观这所房子时
‎就把整件事告诉了他

translation.en: What story?
I suppose he-- he didn't wanna upset you.
translation.zh: ‎我想他应该是不想让你难过

translation.en: -I-- I'm going to go find Travis. -No, no, no. What story, Mare?
translation.zh:
‎-我去找特拉维斯
‎-别走 什么故事 梅尔？

translation.en: He didn't tell you anything about their parents? Hm-mm.
translation.zh:
‎他没有跟你提起过
‎他们父母的事情吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Well… it's just that…
Dear Ella, she was a friend of mine, you know, and… and…
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的艾拉 她之前是我的一个朋友
‎你知道的…

translation.en: Sometimes, I can't help but believe that she…
She's free now.
And-- and I know he struggled financially,
but that horrible man was cruel in-- in ways that you could never know.
translation.zh:
‎但你永远不会知道
‎那个可怕男人的残忍

translation.en: What happened to them?
Catherine, it's not the time. I don't want to ruin your party.
translation.zh:
‎现在不是时候
‎我不想毁掉你们的派对

translation.en: No, no.
Mare, I'm begging you. I need to know this.
translation.zh: ‎梅尔 我求求你 我需要知道这件事

translation.en: All right.
The way I… I heard it
was that… Calvin Vayle
slipped Ella and the boys
translation.zh: ‎某天晚上偷偷给艾拉和两个男孩

translation.en: a sedative one night.
And… when they were out cold, he…
He went outside and shot every one of the cows they owned.
translation.zh: ‎他去外面射杀了他们拥有的所有牛

translation.en: Oh my God.
And then, when he was finished, he went into the garage below their…
translation.zh: ‎后来 他做完了这些 就进了车库 ‎就在他们的卧室下面

translation.en: bedroom,
started the ignition of two trucks and closed the windows.
translation.zh: ‎发动了两辆卡车 关上了窗户

translation.en: The fumes.
Then he went up and…
laid down in bed with Ella until--
translation.zh: ‎和艾拉躺在床上 直到后来…

translation.en: -Oh my God, I was wrong. -They never woke up.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 是我错了
‎-他们就再也没有醒来

translation.en: I had the wrong wife. I--
-Wrong about what? -Your friend Ella. She's here, Mare.
translation.zh:
‎-搞错了什么？
‎-你的朋友艾拉 她还在这里 梅尔

translation.en: Oh my God. Where did you get this?
Wh-what are you doing with this?
She never took this ring off.
You know what?
I've been in this house for three months, and nobody has said anything to me.
translation.zh:
‎我在这栋房子里住了三个月
‎从来没有人对我说过什么

translation.en: Not the mailman, not a neighbor, not-- not the bank teller.
translation.zh:
‎邮差、邻居、银行柜员
‎都没有说什么

translation.en: God, I'm such a fool!
No, no, it's not like that.
-Oh my God! -Catherine, we're from farm stock up here.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊！
‎-凯瑟琳 我们上州这边都是农牧业

translation.en: It's-- it's not our way to get involved with people's personal business.
translation.zh: ‎介入别人的私事不是我们的做事风格

translation.en: You've made this home so warm and inviting,
translation.zh: ‎你让这个家变得这么温馨 这么好客

translation.en: and everyone's moved on so well. I'm sure that George didn't mean--
translation.zh:
‎所有人都已经忘掉以前的事情了
‎我相信乔治不是故意…

translation.en: Do not waste any of your time on George, Mare.
translation.zh: ‎别浪费时间为乔治辩护 梅尔

translation.en: George Claire always gets exactly what he wants.
translation.zh: ‎乔治·克莱尔总是得到他想要的

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
I do.
I know you're a weaver
of fabrics.
And ideas.
Like the ideas you've been putting in my wife's head lately.
translation.zh: ‎比如你一直在我妻子脑中灌输的想法

translation.en: Okay.
Here's something about me you don't know.
I get suspicious
when students worship their professors.
Always leads to trouble.
Is that a dig or advice?
Oh, it's just honesty. You know, like the Good Book says.
translation.zh: ‎只是实话 就像《圣经》里说的那样

translation.en: "The truth will set you free."
I don't know about that.
People really don't want the truth, and they certainly don't want to be set free.
translation.zh:
‎人们真的不想要真理
‎也绝对不想要自由

translation.en: What? Says who?
The Eagles, remember?
-"Hotel California." -[Justine laughs]
Yeah. We, uh-- we all choose our own prison.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我们都会选择自己的监狱

translation.en: Here, give me your hands.
I'll show you why they're right. Here.
translation.zh: ‎我来告诉你 他们为什么是对的

translation.en: -You're going to read my palms now? -Come on.
Okay.
Now,
try to get yourself free.
[grunts] Okay, that's enough. You can let go now, George.
translation.zh: ‎好了 够了 你可以放手了 乔治

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can, but are you sure you really want me to?
translation.zh:
‎我知道我可以
‎但你确定你真的想让我放手吗？

translation.en: -I'm very sure. -Oh.
George, you-- you are hurting me now.
Let go!
W-what?
-[laughing] -Jesus Christ, George.
Hotel California, Justine.
Hotel California!
[George] Good night.
-Drive safe. -[door closes]
Well,
that was a success, huh?
Your friend Justine is a bit of a head case.
translation.zh: ‎你的朋友贾丝廷好像精神有点失常

translation.en: Is she trying to start some trouble or something?
translation.zh: ‎她是想搞出什么麻烦 还是怎样？

translation.en: No, I didn't see Justine all night,
translation.zh: ‎没有 我整晚都没有看到贾丝廷

translation.en: but it's interesting that you ask.
Know what's interesting to me?
Is that this party was supposed to bring you and me together,
translation.zh: ‎是这个派对本来应该让你我和好

translation.en: and as soon as everyone leaves,
you retreat and ice up.
How could you not tell me about this house, George?
translation.zh:
‎你怎么能
‎没跟我讲这个房子的事 乔治？

translation.en: [George sighs] Jesus.
[sighs] I was afraid this might happen.
That one of your lies would be exposed?
translation.zh: ‎担心你的某个谎言会被揭穿？

translation.en: I wasn't lying to you, Cath. I was trying to spare you some unpleasantness.
translation.zh:
‎我没有对你说谎 凯瑟
‎我只是想少给你带来一些不快

translation.en: I can handle unpleasantness, George, okay? I lived through childbirth, remember?
translation.zh:
‎我可以应付不快 乔治 好吗？
‎我孩子都生了 记得吗？

translation.en: I was trying to protect you.
Believe-- believe it or not, I-I actually wanted you to be happy here.
translation.zh:
‎不管你是否相信
‎我其实都想让你在这里幸福

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
Fucking electricity in this house!
[George] What the…
The fuck is going on?
Franny's overdue for a visit with your parents.
translation.zh: ‎弗兰妮早该去看看爷爷奶奶了

translation.en: You can finish off the weekend there.
-[answering machine beeps] -Floyd, it's Catherine.
translation.zh: ‎（《两人窒息死亡 死因可疑》） ‎弗洛伊德‎ ‎我是凯瑟琳

translation.en: I'm ready.
This is her. This is Ella Vayle,
translation.zh: ‎这就是她 这是艾拉·维尔

translation.en: and this is the article I found about her death.
translation.zh: ‎这是我找到的 她死亡的报道

translation.en: But she's trying to…
She's reaching out to me, and I-I need to know why.
translation.zh: ‎她想联络我 我需要知道为什么

translation.en: You're saying the spirit is the most recent resident of your house?
translation.zh: ‎你说这个灵魂最近住在你家里？

translation.en: Yes. I was confused before.
Well, my research turned up something interesting about the original owners,
translation.zh:
‎我的研究
‎发现了房子原主人的一些有趣信息

translation.en: especially for our group here.
What? The Smits?
Reverend Smit's wife
was an early devotee of Swedenborg.
[Floyd] Unfortunately, it was not a happy marriage.
translation.zh: ‎不幸的是 他们的婚姻并不幸福

translation.en: Smit was a strict Calvinist
translation.zh: ‎斯密特是严格的加尔文教徒

translation.en: who strongly disapproved of his wife's philosophic exploration.
translation.zh: ‎他坚决反对他妻子的哲学探索

translation.en: "Damned."
[Floyd] She died in their home
rather mysteriously at age 26.
So much death in my house.
Oh, no, no. Don't think of it that way.
We embrace inhabited houses as a blessing.
translation.zh:
‎我们接受有人住过的房子
‎认为那是一种福气

translation.en: -[Floyd] Mm. -[Millicent] Portals between two realms
with guides to shepherd us once our own time comes.
translation.zh:
‎等我们自己死亡之期来临的时候
‎有人护送引导我们

translation.en: Some religions call them guardian angels.
translation.zh: ‎有些宗教称他们为守护天使

translation.en: Perhaps it's our Swedenborgian friend who first opened the portal door.
translation.zh:
‎或许是我们这位史威登堡的朋友
‎打开了通路的大门

translation.en: We are good at that.
[Millicent] Because it's the afterlife where we reach our greatest purpose.
translation.zh:
‎因为死后生活
‎才是我们要实现的最伟大目标

translation.en: [laughs] You never see these spirits as potentially evil?
translation.zh:
‎你从来没觉得这些灵魂
‎可能是邪恶的？

translation.en: An evil spirit will only commune with an evil-doer.
translation.zh: ‎邪恶的灵魂只会去纠缠邪恶的人

translation.en: [Floyd] Which we will take, on a leap of faith, that you're not.
translation.zh: ‎我们深深相信 你不是邪恶之人

translation.en: -[group laughs] -[local man] And remember.
Evil only thrives in the house where it is welcome.
translation.zh: ‎邪恶只在欢迎它的房子里滋长

translation.en: -[Floyd] Mm. -[local woman] Goodness always triumphs.
Always. If not in this world, then in the next.
translation.zh:
‎总会 即使在这个世界中无法胜利
‎在下个世界中也会胜利

translation.en: [Floyd] We should start,
yes?
Let whomever the spirit is
speak for herself.
[ghostly voice] As evil comes to light,
beware!
[Floyd] She's making her presence known. We welcome her, don't we, Catherine?
translation.zh:
‎她想要别人知道她的存在
‎我们欢迎她 对吧 凯瑟琳？

translation.en: We do. We… I-- I do.
[ghostly voice 2] Get back here!
-[ghostly voice] No! -[ghostly voice 2] Ella.
-[Catherine] What happened? -[Floyd] She wants to break through. She's trying.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么回事？
‎-她想出去 她很努力想出去

translation.en: But something, someone is stopping her.
translation.zh: ‎但是什么东西 什么人在阻止她

translation.en: [ghostly voice] You're suffocating me!
[Catherine] What was that? Oh my God.
I'm afraid this home has another spirit.
translation.zh: ‎恐怕这个家里还有一个灵魂

translation.en: And until that spirit reveals its nature,
be careful of those around you, Catherine.
translation.zh: ‎小心你身边的人 凯瑟琳

translation.en: -[Franny] Mama, Mama! -Hi, baby.
Come here. Did you have fun at Grandma and Grandpa's house?
translation.zh: ‎过来 你在爷爷奶奶家玩得开心吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Did you look for seashells on the beach?
translation.zh:
‎-开心
‎-你在海滩上找贝壳了吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Really? Are they pretty? Yeah!
Keep moving, everyone. Hustle.
translation.zh: ‎大家动起来 我们可不想进城的时候

translation.en: We don't wanna get caught in traffic on the way into the city.
translation.zh: ‎大家动起来 我们可不想进城的时候 ‎赶上堵车

translation.en: Nearly there, nearly full.
Tommy, good. Thank you for com--
translation.zh: ‎汤米 很好 谢谢你来…

translation.en: -Justine. -George.
I, uh, I didn't know you were joining us.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你也和我们一起去

translation.en: Floyd wanted an additional chaperone.
translation.zh: ‎弗洛伊德想要多一个监护人

translation.en: [student] I'm here!
Right, Katie. You're the last.
translation.zh: ‎好 凯蒂 你是最后一个

translation.en: [Franny] Where are we going?
Get in the car, baby. I'll be there in a sec.
translation.zh: ‎上车 宝贝 我马上就来

translation.en: Eddie!
There's something I have to give you that I, uh…
found in the house a while back before I learned the truth.
translation.zh:
‎之前不知道真相的时候
‎在房子里发现的

translation.en: It's a little bit tight on me.
-Just leave it. -No, no, it belongs to you and Cole.
translation.zh:
‎-就这样吧
‎-不 它属于你和科尔

translation.en: She would want you to have this.
I don't want it.
I noticed it on you a couple weeks ago.
translation.zh: ‎我几周之前就发现你戴着了

translation.en: It just seemed right.
You and Mom would have liked each other.
translation.zh: ‎你和我妈妈肯定会彼此喜欢的

translation.en: Three on the bottom are on time.
translation.zh:
‎下面的三本没有超期
‎我在我丈夫的车里

translation.en: I found that overdue one in my husband's car, I can pay the fine.
translation.zh:
‎下面的三本没有超期
‎我在我丈夫的车里 ‎找到一本超期的 我可以付罚款

translation.en: It's just on his card.
Actually, this one's checked out under the name Willis Howell.
translation.zh:
‎这本是以
‎维利斯·霍韦尔的名字借出的

translation.en: Oh, that's odd.
It's unisex, you know?
translation.zh: ‎这个名字男女通用 你知道吗？

translation.en: Excuse me? The name, Willis.
She's a pretty thing.
In here a lot on weekends.
Daddy's friend.
Don't worry. I'll ask her to pay the fine.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我会让她付罚金的

translation.en: I'd like to open a new account.
Of course, Mrs. Claire.
Uh, just… just fill out, um,
this form.
Uh, we will require George's signature if it's a joint account.
translation.zh:
‎如果这是双方共有账户
‎我们会要求乔治签名

translation.en: It's not.
[George] Okay, everyone. Here we are.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 我们到了

translation.en: [man] George Claire?
[chuckles] Good God.
Dr. Warren. Wow. [chuckles]
What an odd coincidence.
Odd indeed.
I was told that you had moved away for good.
Well, I, you know, couldn't resist coming back for this exhibit.
translation.zh: ‎我禁不住诱惑 想回来看这个展

translation.en: You might remember my passion for Thomas Cole.
translation.zh:
‎你或许还记得
‎我对托马斯·科尔的热情

translation.en: Yes, I do. I just wish you had shown the same passion for your dissertation.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我记得 我真希望你对你的论文
‎也能展现出这种热情

translation.en: Excuse me. Professor Claire, um,
in the third Voyage of Life painting, why is the sailor so distraught?
translation.zh:
‎在第三幅《生命之旅》画作中
‎乘船者为什么那么心烦意乱？

translation.en: Oh, the third one is called, uh, Manhood.
Uh, it's when Cole believes we, uh, we lose the confidence of youth.
translation.zh:
‎在这个时期 科尔相信
‎我们失去了年轻时的信心

translation.en: Uh, go-- go check out the sailor's hands. They're no longer on the tiller.
translation.zh:
‎去看看乘船者的手
‎已经不在船舵上了

translation.en: -[student] Thanks, Professor Claire. -[Dr. Warren clears throat]
Yeah… You know, I'm curious. Um…
How did you get a teaching position without a recommendation?
translation.zh:
‎你没有人推荐
‎是怎么拿到教职工作的？

translation.en: Oh, I'm, um, I'm just a temp instructor.
Um, one of the professors took an emergency leave, and I, uh…
translation.zh: ‎有一个教授突然请假了 我就…

translation.en: I just stepped in to help.
Interesting, then, how the students, uh, they call you professor.
translation.zh: ‎学生们居然叫你教授 真有意思

translation.en: [chuckling awkwardly] Yeah, yeah.
Uh, yeah, right. I keep correcting them.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 对 我一直纠正他们

translation.en: Yeah. I get so tired of correcting them.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 纠正到我都很厌烦了

translation.en: Good day, Claire.
What…
What was all that about?
Uh, yeah, I have no idea.
I kind of think you do.
I don't think you should see Justine anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你不应该再见贾丝廷了

translation.en: There's a lot of talk about her at Saginaw.
translation.zh: ‎塞基诺学院有很多她的流言

translation.en: What kind of talk, George?
Well, they say she's a closet lesbian.
translation.zh: ‎他们说她是没出柜的同性恋

translation.en: And she's clearly obsessed with you.
[sighs] I think she is…
instigating problems between us intentionally.
[George] Floyd, heading home for the holiday? [Floyd] What?
translation.zh:
‎-弗洛伊德 假期回家吗？
‎-什么？

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Not for a while yet. I-I still have, uh…
translation.zh: ‎不是 近期不会 我还要…

translation.en: -I have work to finish. -Is something wrong?
translation.zh:
‎-我还有工作要完成
‎-出什么事了吗？

translation.en: Actually,
I got a call this morning from Shelby Warren,
translation.zh: ‎我今天早上接到了谢比·沃伦的电话

translation.en: your advisor from Columbia.
His recommendation letter, the one submitted with your application,
translation.zh: ‎他的推荐信 你申请职位时提交的

translation.en: he claims he never wrote it.
Shelby's recollection is that you asked him,
translation.zh: ‎按照谢比的记忆 他说你问他了

translation.en: but he told you he couldn't do it.
translation.zh: ‎但是他告诉你 不能给你写

translation.en: In good conscience. I remember the conversation well.
translation.zh: ‎凭良心讲 这段对话我记忆犹新

translation.en: -You forged it, didn't you? -No. I… I…
translation.zh:
‎-是你伪造的 是吧？
‎-不是 我…

translation.en: Floyd, I wrote the letter that I deserved.
translation.zh:
‎弗洛伊德 我只是写了
‎我该得到的推荐信

translation.en: I-- I-- You need to understand why.
As you know, I'm quite fond of you, George,
translation.zh: ‎你也知道 我非常喜欢你

translation.en: and you're popular with your students, but this is a serious accusation.
translation.zh:
‎你很受学生的欢迎
‎但这是很严肃的指控

translation.en: Can't we put a pin in this until after the holiday? -Oh… -Please, please, Floyd.
translation.zh:
‎我们能不能放假回来之后
‎再来处理这件事 弗洛伊德？

translation.en: I-- I understand your dilemma. I do.
Floyd, I-- I have my entire family up here.
translation.zh:
‎弗洛伊德
‎我的整个家庭都搬到了这里

translation.en: I'm supposed to be home in an hour.
I-- I really deserve the chance to sit down and be heard.
translation.zh:
‎我真的应该得到一个坐下来
‎你听我说的机会

translation.en: Man to man, huh?
Friend to friend.
I'll schedule an appointment.
[man] I know you all think that Audrey is a quite calm, conservative soul,
translation.zh:
‎我知道你们认为
‎奥黛丽有着平静、保守的灵魂

translation.en: but back in the day, she was absolutely wild.
-Don't believe a word! -And then George came along.
translation.zh:
‎-我根本不信！
‎-然后乔治出生了

translation.en: And he was always getting into trouble,
which is why I went gray by 30.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才30岁就长了不少白头发

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, stop!
But the real troublemaker was this cousin that George idolized.
translation.zh:
‎但是真正制造麻烦的人 ‎是乔治崇敬的这个表哥
‎居然是个货真价实的同性恋

translation.en: Turned out to be a first-class homo.
translation.zh:
‎是乔治崇敬的这个表哥
‎居然是个货真价实的同性恋

translation.en: I don't know what was worse for his parents: that he drowned or was gay.
translation.zh:
‎真不知道他父母觉得哪一个更糟
‎当同性恋 还是溺水而亡

translation.en: That is a truly repugnant thing to say.
She's right, Tom.
Henry's death was a family tragedy.
He was such a talented young man.
translation.zh: ‎他生前也是那么有天赋的年轻人

translation.en: Henry used to do these exquisite watercolors. Teeny-tiny paintings.
translation.zh: ‎亨利以前会画精美的水彩 小小的画

translation.en: What were the… the paintings of?
Oh, the shoreline, ospreys, lighthouses.
Just common seaside things.
Turkey time, everybody.
It's the way he presented them that was unique.
They even wanted to do a showing of his work after he passed, but…
translation.zh:
‎他去世之后 他们还想
‎给他的画作办一个展览 但是…

translation.en: they all just disappeared, apparently.
-[Catherine's mom] What a shame. -It really was.
-[man] Nice job on the turkey, George. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-火鸡做得不错 乔治
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Please, eat. It's gonna get cold.
Could you excuse me one minute?
So you're starting with all this again?
I happen to be sick, George.
translation.zh: ‎我就是突然感觉恶心 乔治

translation.en: Throwing up my marriage.
Now leave me the fuck alone!
-Catherine… -[door slams, lock clicks]
[George] What the fuck?
Cath? Catherine?
[Audrey] George?
[Ella] Please.
Please.
[male ghostly voice] No one understands us.
I am here for you.
George.
Free yourself.
[Floyd, in distance] How was your holiday?
Hello, Floyd.
George.
I didn't expect to see you till tomorrow.
Taking advantage of the warm spell we're having, huh?
translation.zh:
‎好好利用一下
‎现在还拥有的温暖咒语 是吧？

translation.en: Yeah, I thought I'd go out one last time before storing her for winter.
translation.zh:
‎对 我觉得应该再出航一次
‎之后就要收起来过冬了

translation.en: You're so lucky to have her.
translation.zh: ‎你拥有这艘船 真的好幸运

translation.en: That last spin you took me on, it… [grunts]
…it really reminded me how much I-- I miss sailing.
translation.zh: ‎真的让我想起了 我有多怀念航行

translation.en: Especially when…
when I'm feeling a little… a little low.
You want to join me?
Oh, no. I-- I…
-I don't want to in-- intrude. -It's fine.
The river's as good a place as any to have our talk.
translation.zh: ‎河水中也一样适合我们交谈

translation.en: Hey.
What's the matter? Are you okay?
Things…
just aren't great.
It's him, isn't it?
I know his kind all too well.
I grew up with it.
translation.zh: ‎我就是在这种人身边长大的

translation.en: If I had someone as good as you, I'd kiss the fucking ground she walked on.
translation.zh:
‎如果我拥有你这么好的妻子 ‎我都愿意亲吻她走过的土地
‎我向上帝发誓

translation.en: I swear to God.
translation.zh:
‎我都愿意亲吻她走过的土地
‎我向上帝发誓

translation.en: [George] I'm eager to tell you the truth
about the…
problems I had at Columbia with… with Shelby.
translation.zh: ‎我和谢比在哥伦比亚大学的问题

translation.en: Look, it's a complicated story, but, um…
translation.zh: ‎其实真是个复杂的故事 但是…

translation.en: essentially,
I got ostracized…
for reporting misconduct.
It was… it was sexual misconduct.
Look, I'm willing to listen, because I-- I care about your well-being,
translation.zh: ‎我愿意听 因为我在乎你的身心健康

translation.en: but forgery,
regardless of the reason,
is a crime.
I don't want us meeting on false pretenses here.
translation.zh:
‎我不希望我们的认识
‎建立在伪装的基础上

translation.en: I can't keep this to myself forever.
Yeah, I-I understand that, and-and, look, I appreciate your dilemma--
So…
So tomorrow, I plan to bring the situation to HR.
translation.zh:
‎所以明天
‎我打算把这个情况报告给人事

translation.en: And we both know the outcome.
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道会有怎样的后果

translation.en: They won't permit you to remain on staff.
translation.zh: ‎他们不会允许你继续做教职的

translation.en: You okay, George?
There, there.
All things must pass.
Yeah.
I promise you'll get through this.
-Hey, Cal. -Hey.
I called in a take-out order.
Be right back.
[chuckles] Excuse me. Sorry, I just wonder…
translation.zh: ‎打扰一下 抱歉 我在想…

translation.en: Where did you buy that scarf?
It was a gift.
[Cal] There you go, $6.57.
Thanks. Just two back, please.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 给我找两美元零钱

translation.en: You're putting in late nights too, huh, George?
Jesus.
Look--
You're soaking wet.
[laughs] What-- what the fuck, Justine?
Are you officially stalking me now?
Officially? No.
Then why are you suddenly everywhere I turn?
translation.zh:
‎那为什么我不管在哪里回头
‎你都能突然出现？

translation.en: Because I really care about Catherine.
Yeah, you've made that perfectly clear.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你表现得很明显了

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure how to take that.
translation.zh: ‎我不确定该怎样理解你这句话

translation.en: I-- I kind of think that you do.
Tell me, George, how'd your mom like that scarf I made her?
translation.zh:
‎告诉我 乔治 我给你妈妈
‎织的那条围巾 她喜欢吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, she…
She didn't really care for it, actually.
She… she said that it felt cheap.
Well, that explains the neck it ended up on, then, huh?
translation.zh: ‎怪不得会系到另一个人的脖子上

translation.en: Go fuck yourself.
Do you want to explain what happened at the Met?
translation.zh:
‎你想解释一下
‎大都会艺术博物馆发生的事吗？

translation.en: If you got something to say to me, Justine, you should just spit it out.
translation.zh: ‎如果你有话对我说 贾丝廷 请你直说

translation.en: [Justine] I will.
[reporter on radio] Government said there was no way
they would meet the new demands for the hostages' release.
translation.zh: ‎政府说他们不可能满足 ‎释放人质的新要求

translation.en: Then it accused the Iranians of not taking good care of the hostages.
translation.zh:
‎然后它指控伊朗人
‎没有好好照顾这些人质

translation.en: [reporter 2] The Carter Administration stepped up its pressure
translation.zh:
‎卡特政府今天加大了
‎对伊朗政府的施压力度

translation.en: on the Iranian government by charging the hostages…
translation.zh:
‎卡特政府今天加大了
‎对伊朗政府的施压力度 ‎指控这些人质…

translation.en: Oh my God.
What are you doing?
Fucking psycho!
What happened to your clothes?
I got sick on them.
You and I need to talk.
Not tonight, we don't. And why is that?
Did you not hear me? I said I got sick.
translation.zh: ‎你没听到我说话吗？我说我病了

translation.en: Sleep down here, then. I don't wanna catch anything you have.
translation.zh: ‎那你在楼下睡吧 我不想被你传染

translation.en: [George] If you're really here,
show me a sign.
Oh my God!
What the fuck is going…
Have your boyfriend fix the window in the morning.
[George] Cole.
Hey, it's George Claire.
Uh, I have an emergency this morning.
I was wondering if we could get you here a little bit early.
translation.zh: ‎我在想 能不能让你早一点过来

translation.en: Can I help you?
Oh, uh, I need this filled quickly.
It's for my daughter's night terrors.
They say she might never come out of this.
translation.zh: ‎他们说 她可能一辈子都是这样

translation.en: The doctor never met Justine.
He doesn't know the force of her personality, Bram.
translation.zh: ‎他不知道她性格的力量 布拉姆

translation.en: [reporter] …Department of Agriculture. The announcement comes tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎…农业部 正式通知将于明天公布

translation.en: In other news, police have identified the body pulled from the Hudson last night
translation.zh:
‎其他新闻 警方确认了
‎昨晚从哈德逊河打捞出的尸体

translation.en: as 68-year-old Saginaw professor Floyd DeBeers,
translation.zh:
‎是68岁的塞基诺学院教授
‎弗洛伊德·德比尔斯

translation.en: a frequent fixture of the Hudson sailing community.
translation.zh: ‎他是哈德逊河帆船社区的常客

translation.en: What?
Yeah, I guess he went out for a sail yesterday and…
translation.zh:
‎对 他昨天应该是
‎驾船航行去了 然后…

translation.en: They assumed he had a heart attack and fell overboard.
translation.zh: ‎他们认为他是心脏病发 跌入水中

translation.en: Oh… oh my God.
[exhales sharply] Jesus.
Yeah.
I know you two became very close very quickly,
translation.zh: ‎我知道你们两个很快就成了好朋友

translation.en: so I-I'll keep you posted on the memorial service.
translation.zh: ‎所以葬礼事宜 我会通知你的

translation.en: Yeah.
And… we're going to be needing an interim chair.
translation.zh: ‎我们还需要一个临时系主任

translation.en: Your name came up,
if you'd be willing.
Oh God, um…
Yeah, yeah.
Whatever the department needs.
I have some very sad news to report.
Some of you may have already heard.
translation.zh: ‎你们有些人可能已经听说了

translation.en: Wait. Why-- why is this up?
translation.zh: ‎等一下 这个怎么上去了？

translation.en: I-I didn't choose this slide.
What is this?
Huh? Who did this?
Is this some kind of joke?
Who did this? Huh?
Who did this?
[yelling] Who the fuck is responsible for this?
Well, fuck it. [breathing shakily]
You're home early.
Did you cancel your class?
Is something wrong, Cath?
Why?
Well, you… [scoffs]
You skipped your protein shake again.
Thanks.
Where's Cole?
He had to leave
because you had him come in so early today.
Right.
Well, that's good. We can… We can sit down, have that chat you've been pushing for.
translation.zh:
‎很好 我们可以坐下来
‎谈谈一直推后的事情了

translation.en: I don't think so. Not tonight.
Why not tonight? You said it was extremely important.
translation.zh:
‎为什么今晚不行？
‎你说过这件事非常重要

translation.en: I don't think that it is anymore.
-What were you doing upstairs? -I was putting Franny to bed.
translation.zh:
‎-你在楼上干什么了？
‎-我在哄弗兰妮睡觉

translation.en: Oh, what? I… I can't give her a goodnight kiss?
translation.zh: ‎什么？我不能给她一个晚安吻了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, she was very tired, George.
translation.zh: ‎是的 她很累了 乔治

translation.en: You know? I think I'm gonna give her a kiss anyway.
translation.zh:
‎不管怎样 我觉得我还是要去
‎给她一个晚安吻

translation.en: No, she's out cold, George. No, she's…
translation.zh: ‎不用了 她睡着了 乔治 她…

translation.en: -George. -[Franny moans]
Why is she dressed?
I told you. She was tired.
You know that they're expecting a deep freeze tonight?
It's a terrible time to travel.
Hey, where are you going?
-Jesus! -Get downstairs.
Get off!
-Get off of me! -Hey, Catherine!
Catherine!
What are you doing, huh? What the hell is this?
Let go of me, George!
Where do you think you're going? With my goddamn daughter!
translation.zh: ‎你想去哪儿？还要带走我的女儿！

translation.en: -Home! -This is your fucking home!
Nowhere's home with you, George!
translation.zh: ‎和你在一起就不是家 乔治！

translation.en: Fuck!
I know about Floyd!
Your clothes were soaked that night! And Justine? You hated her.
translation.zh:
‎那天晚上你的衣服都湿透了！
‎还有贾丝廷？ ‎你一直恨她 我知道是你干的
‎我心里其实早就明白

translation.en: I know you were involved. I know it in my bones.
translation.zh:
‎你一直恨她 我知道是你干的
‎我心里其实早就明白

translation.en: And what about that cousin? That cousin whose identity you stole?
translation.zh: ‎还有被你偷走身份的那个表哥呢？

translation.en: Oh, you've… you've really lost your mind, you know that?
You've-- you've gone way, way over the edge!
translation.zh: ‎你太离谱了 你太出格了！

translation.en: No, I've woken up.
And so will Franny when she learns exactly who her father is.
translation.zh:
‎在弗兰妮知道她爸爸的真面目之后
‎她也会清醒的

translation.en: You want to leave? Go! Go, if you want to.
translation.zh: ‎你想走吗？如果你想走 你就走吧

translation.en: Go. Get up. Leave your daughter with this, this monster you've conjured up
translation.zh:
‎走吧 站起来
‎把你的女儿留给这个怪物

translation.en: in your paranoid, food-deprived brain!
translation.zh:
‎你那个缺乏食物滋养的偏执大脑
‎臆想出来的怪物

translation.en: Oh, my God.
No!
[screaming] Help!
Somebody help us!
Franny!
Franny!
Ella, help me.
[Ella] Fate.
Catherine.
On the path of fate…
[Ella] …I can gather sharp stones
so you don't feel their pain.
translation.zh: ‎这样你就不会感受到他们的痛

translation.en: Oh my God. Franny!
Where did he put you?
[Ella] But another's free will…
is his alone.
[Ella] Our essence… united.
[Catherine] Baby?
[Ella] I would give my life again
for the power to stop this.
[Catherine, distorted] Baby.
Where is…
[Ella] Just know, Catherine.
As she was there for me,
I am here… for you.
[male ghostly voice] No.
-[male ghostly voice] Stop this! -[Ella] No!
[male ghostly voice] George.
[male ghostly voice] George.
Free yourself.
[Ella] Those who commune with evil
never win.
-[splatting] -[male ghostly voice] Again!
Mrs. Claire?
[George] Cole, my wife is ill, so do not disturb her.
translation.zh: ‎科尔 我的妻子生病了 不要打扰她

translation.en: Franny should take her usual nap.
translation.zh: ‎弗兰妮应该像往常一样睡个午觉

translation.en: Her sippy cup is prepared in the fridge.
translation.zh: ‎她的吸管杯在冰箱里准备好了

translation.en: Make sure she drinks it.
Feel free to leave once she's fast asleep.
translation.zh: ‎等她睡熟了 你就可以走了

translation.en: [Cole] Bye, Mrs. Claire.
Feel better.
Laughton residence.
Yeah. Hello, Travis.
-It's Sam Pratt. -Hi, Sam. Everything okay?
translation.zh:
‎-我是山姆·普拉特
‎-嗨 山姆 一切都好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, actually, we… we do have a bit of a situation.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我们确实遇到了一点麻烦

translation.en: I got my neighbor here, you know, the college professor.
translation.zh: ‎我邻居在这里 就是那个大学教授

translation.en: Um, apparently, something happened to his wife.
It's…
Is that your ax, George?
29-year-old Catherine Claire was found brutally murdered
translation.zh: ‎29岁的凯瑟琳·克莱尔在天选镇

translation.en: at her farmhouse here in Chosen, New York.
She was discovered by her husband, Saginaw professor…
translation.zh: ‎发现者是她丈夫 塞基诺学院的教授…

translation.en: Willis. Willis.
You've heard.
-I should have done something. -[Eddie] Okay.
[woman] Here it comes.
All right, here we go.
What's your gut?
Sure seems broken up.
Robbery gone bad. Really?
Mmm… Alibi checks out.
The college says he was teaching the whole day.
translation.zh: ‎学院说 他一整天都在上课

translation.en: Shall I let him go for the night? His parents are out front.
translation.zh:
‎我今晚要放他走吗？
‎他父母就在大门外

translation.en: Go ahead. There's someone else I need to talk to.
translation.zh: ‎去吧 我还需要和另一个人谈谈

translation.en: Come on.
They can't force us to come back tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎他们不能强迫我们明天再来

translation.en: You are not speaking to anyone until we secure a criminal attorney.
translation.zh:
‎在我们去曼哈顿找到刑事律师前
‎你不能和任何人

translation.en: From Manhattan.
First thing in the morning, we're leaving this godforsaken place for Connecticut.
translation.zh:
‎明天一早 我们就离开这个鬼地方
‎去康涅狄格州

translation.en: Did you ever see him hit her?
Threaten her?
[exhales] No, no, I never…
She just told me that she hated him.
translation.zh: ‎她只是告诉我 她痛恨她丈夫

translation.en: Lots of wives hate their husbands.
Lots of husbands hate their wives.
That doesn't mean that they'd put an ax in their gut.
translation.zh:
‎但那并不意味着
‎要拿斧头劈开对方的肠子

translation.en: Do you know if he might have been cheating on her?
Or maybe she was cheating on him.
translation.zh:
‎-或者女方出过轨？
‎-我就知道是他杀的 好吗？

translation.en: I just know he fucking did it, Travis! I'm telling you he did it!
translation.zh:
‎-或者女方出过轨？
‎-我就知道是他杀的 好吗？ ‎我告诉你 就是他杀的
‎你们一定要相信我 好吗？

translation.en: You have to believe me, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我告诉你 就是他杀的
‎你们一定要相信我 好吗？

translation.en: I never said I don't, son, but you're giving me nothing here.
translation.zh:
‎我没说不相信你 孩子
‎但你没有给我任何信息

translation.en: Fuck, man!
So he has a solid alibi?
translation.zh: ‎他真的有可靠的不在场证明？

translation.en: He was at work all day.
Took the art department out for drinks,
translation.zh: ‎带整个艺术系的同事出去喝东西

translation.en: even had the babysitter come.
But you said he could have done it earlier.
translation.zh: ‎但你说过 他也可能是在那之前干的

translation.en: The coroner confirmed as much.
Possibly. It's difficult to prove.
Fingerprints? There any fingerprints?
They're everywhere. He lived there.
translation.zh: ‎到处都是指纹 他住在那里

translation.en: Guess who else's are on the ax.
translation.zh: ‎猜猜斧头上面还有谁的指纹

translation.en: Eddie Vayle.
No.
Not Eddie.
That boy has his poor mother's soul.
translation.zh: ‎那个男孩的心地跟他的可怜妈妈一样

translation.en: Travis, it's so obvious George Claire did this.
translation.zh:
‎特拉维斯
‎很明显就是乔治·克莱尔干的

translation.en: -You have to arrest him. -I know.
But I need another person to connect the dots.
translation.zh:
‎但我需要另一个人
‎来把零散的证据连起来

translation.en: That may take time.
[Mare] Where is the justice for the women of that house?
translation.zh:
‎那栋房子的女主人
‎要去哪里寻找正义？

translation.en: -[voice 1] Guardian angel. -[voice 2] Wake up.
[voice 3] Goodness always triumphs.
If not in this world, then in the next.
translation.zh:
‎即使在这个世界中无法胜利
‎在下个世界中也会胜利

translation.en: [Catherine] Franny! Somebody help us!
[Ella and Catherine] Justine, it's time.
[Audrey] George?
Someone called while you were sleeping.
translation.zh: ‎你睡觉的时候 有人打来电话

translation.en: -Another journalist? -No, no.
Someone claiming to be an old friend.
They left a message. Very cryptic.
translation.zh: ‎还留了一条信息 非常让人费解

translation.en: Did you get a name?
Yes.
Sokolov. Justine Sokolov.
translation.zh: ‎索科洛夫 贾丝廷·索科洛夫

translation.en: I'll just…
[Calvin] They made this happen.
[echoing] It's their fault.
They have always tried to hold you back.
You are envied.
Unrecognized.
Trust in your impulses.
Go.
I can't let you go out.
-That boat isn't up-to-date on fees. -Just going out for a minute.
translation.zh:
‎-这艘船的一些费用还没结清
‎-我就开出去一会儿

translation.en: No, can't let it happen.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我不能让你开出去

translation.en: I'd really appreciate it, sir.
translation.zh: ‎我会非常感激你的 先生

translation.en: Mind just giving me a hand?
Travis.
Good afternoon.
Up for a chat? Yeah.
[Ella and Catherine] The gates of Hell are only visible
to those about to come into it.
He who is evil
is also in the punishment of evil.
Damned.
Damned.
Damned.
[Ella and Catherine] Damned. Damned.
The world of spirits is not Heaven or Hell.
translation.zh: ‎灵魂的世界既不是天堂 也不是地狱

translation.en: We stand between the two.
We have lost our children.
Because of you,
we are joined in spirit.
Because of you,
our powers grow…
…from tiny drops…
…into an endless sea.
